Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan is set to face Afghanistan in a Super 4 clash at Asia Cup 2022 tomorrow, September 7 (Wednesday). The Boys in Green will be high on confident following their victory over India in the first match of this round-robin stage. Babar Azam's side held their nerve and clinched a five-wicket win against their archrivals in a see-saw battle in Dubai. A victory against the Afghans tomorrow will ensure their berth in the final of the continental tournament. On the other hand, Afghanistan will look to get back to winning ways after their narrow defeat against Sri Lanka in the first match of the Super 4 stage. This contest will be a do-or-die match for Mohammad Nabi's side as a defeat against Pakistan will knock them out of the competition.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pakistan vs Afghanistan Asia Cup 2022 match is set to be played at the Sharjah Cricket Stadium in Sharjah.
The live online streaming of Pakistan vs Afghanistan Asia Cup will be available on the Disney+ Hotstar website and mobile app.
Others: PAK vs AFG T20Is Head-to-Head: Pakistan have emerged victorious in both previous encounters.
PAK vs AFG Asia Cup 2022 Key Players: Babar Azam, Shadab Khan, Mohammad Rizwan for Pakistan; Hazratullah Zazai, Ibrahim Zadran, Rahmanullah Gurbaz for Afghanistan.
